txt.en: You should find Anoch hiding somewhere in Melgobas.
Approach the well across from the Melgobas stables

'Hehe, that was fun! Thanks!'

He pauses to hesitate, the smile on his face slowly fading.

'Um, may I tell you a secret? My sister, Hedra... she's been gone for a long time. She took Father's knife with her. I don't know what she's going to do, but she made me promise not to tell anyone. That sounds bad... right?
You've found Anoch!\n\nYou should talk to him.
You should give Anoch ten seconds to hide.

'Will you play a game with me? My sister is busy, so I've got no one to play with... I'll hide somewhere, and you'll have to find me. I promise I won't go far.\n\n'Go to the well over there, across from the horses. Close your eyes and count slow! You have to play fair!'
A lonely boy in Melgobas wants to play a game.
Anoch has asked you to play a game with him. He'll hide, and you'll have to find him.\n\nTo start, you should approach the we
